LocaleResource.Name: Admin.FoxNetSoft.Plugin.Misc.PDFInvoice.IsNoRegisted
LocaleResource.Value: Unregistered version is fully operational. Only 50 invoices will be created.

LocaleResource.Name: Admin.FoxNetSoft.Plugin.Misc.PDFInvoice.IsExpired
LocaleResource.Value: Your license has expired, you should renew the license with a 50% discount.

LocaleResource.Name: Admin.FoxNetSoft.Plugin.Misc.PDFInvoice.Enabled.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: Create PDF invoices in the new format.

LocaleResource.Name: Admin.FoxNetSoft.Plugin.Misc.PDFInvoice.showDebugInfo.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: Write debugging information to a file in the ~/App_Data/ folder.

LocaleResource.Name: Admin.FoxNetSoft.Plugin.Misc.PDFInvoice.LogoPicture.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: Image file that will be displayed in PDF order invoices. A small image is recommended. Supported formats: PNG (with transparency), JPEG, or SVG (best for logos). If not set, the system will use the store's logo from Media Settings.

LocaleResource.Name: Admin.FoxNetSoft.Plugin.Misc.PDFInvoice.OverWrittenClass
LocaleResource.Value: Error. The class {0} was overwritten by the new class '{1}'. Uninstall another plugin or change it.

LocaleResource.Name: Admin.FoxNetSoft.Plugin.Misc.PDFInvoice.PDFTemplate.List.TemplateType.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: Search by a specific PDF template type.

LocaleResource.Name: Admin.FoxNetSoft.Plugin.Misc.PDFInvoice.PDFTemplate.Fields.Store.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: Select the store for this PDF template. Choose "All" to use this template for all stores.

LocaleResource.Name: Admin.FoxNetSoft.Plugin.Misc.PDFInvoice.PDFTemplate.Fields.Name.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: The name of the PDF template.

LocaleResource.Name: Admin.FoxNetSoft.Plugin.Misc.PDFInvoice.PDFTemplate.Fields.Name.Required
LocaleResource.Value: Please enter a name for the PDF template.

LocaleResource.Name: Admin.FoxNetSoft.Plugin.Misc.PDFInvoice.PDFTemplate.Fields.Picture.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: Provide the logo for the PDF template.

LocaleResource.Name: Admin.FoxNetSoft.Plugin.Misc.PDFInvoice.PDFTemplate.Fields.Published.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: Published PDF template. nopCommerce will use it for creating invoices and packaging slips.

LocaleResource.Name: Admin.FoxNetSoft.Plugin.Misc.PDFInvoice.PDFTemplate.Fields.AclCustomerRoles.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: Select customer roles for which the PDF template will be shown. Leave empty if you want this PDF template to be visible to all users.

LocaleResource.Name: Admin.FoxNetSoft.Plugin.Misc.PDFInvoice.PDFTemplate.Fields.AllowedTokens.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: This is a list of the tokens you can use in your PDF template for all sections.

LocaleResource.Name: Admin.FoxNetSoft.Plugin.Misc.PDFInvoice.PDFTemplate.Fields.AllowedOrderSummaryTokens.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: This is a list of the tokens you can use in your PDF template for the order summary section.

LocaleResource.Name: Admin.FoxNetSoft.Plugin.Misc.PDFInvoice.PDFTemplate.Fields.AllowedOrderItemTokens.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: This is a list of the tokens you can use in your PDF template for the product table section.

LocaleResource.Name: Admin.FoxNetSoft.Plugin.Misc.PDFInvoice.PDFTemplate.Fields.PreconfiguredTemplate.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: This is a list of the preconfigured templates and you can use them as a source for your template.
